specific - relation - general.open_cyper: MATCH (n1:sequence_variant)-[r:eQTL_of]->(n2:gene) WHERE n1.id = '@sequence_variant' RETURN n1, r, n2
extend_cyper: })-[r]-(neighbor) RETURN g.id AS GeneID, type(r) AS RelationshipType, collect(neighbor.id) AS NeighborIDs
next_questions: Which {function ontologies@ontology} are linked to {gene identifier@n1:gene}?
visualizations: Gene Association and Regulation Browser - Gene

general - relationship - specific.open_cyper: MATCH (n1:sequence_variant)-[r:eQTL_of]->(n2:gene) WHERE n2.id = '@gene' RETURN n1, r, n2
extend_cyper: })-[r]-(neighbor) RETURN g.id AS GeneID, type(r) AS RelationshipType, collect(neighbor.id) AS NeighborIDs
